song.title: Humble King
song.lyrics:
[v] .D Em D/F# Oh kneel me down again .G A2 D Here at Your feet . Em D/F# G A2 D Show me how much You love humility || . Em D/F# G A2 Bm A2 G Oh Spirit be the star that leads me to . D/F# Em A7 A7sus D The humble heart of love I see in You
[c] . G D/F# You are the God of the broken . Em A2 The friend of the weak . G D/F# You wash the feet of the weary . Em A2 Embrace the ones in need || . G D/F# I want to be like You, Jesus . Em A2 To have this heart in me . Em D/F# You are the God of the humble . G A2 D You are the humble King
song.author: Brenton Brown
